attributes.additional_details:
We have rights to not have Isis views imposed+ also is against our human rights, and against the law, as per 
ARTICLE 9 Freedom of thought, conscience and religion Sect “2 “
+ Public order act 1985
5 Harassment, alarm or distress.
under common law the presence of isis flags are also a breach of peace + under the terrorist act 2000 Section 13
“Uniform (1)"
laws are here to protect the public against terrorist exhibitions +  impositions so please listen to law abiding citizens we have rights too!
attributes.background: The ISIS flag is a pure rep of a terrorist group/organisation isis +modern jihadists therefore adopt this flag to legitimise their allegiance The flag in its entirety is used by Al-Shabab in Somalia + AQ in  A/ Peninsula among others but this is purely isis to accept this flag is to accept terrorism
